channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CAMEL-6683] camel-dozer - Does not work well in OSGi Blueprint
item.description:
Dozer doesnt work to well in OSGi. It seems to work with spring, but fails with OSGi blueprint.

item.summary: camel-dozer - Does not work well in OSGi Blueprint

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
You should configure dozer using org.apache.camel.converter.dozer.DozerBeanMapperConfiguration as shown on: https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/CAMEL/Dozer+Type+Conversion

Dozer 5.5 works better in OSGi as it also has an OSGi Activator. So when this version is released we can upgrade and have Dozer work better with OSGi Blueprint.

I asked about a 5.5.0 release of Dozer at
https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topic/dozer-mapper/jDfxFW4pkqY
It works better now. Though upgrading to Dozer 5.5.0 works even better. Though Dozer 5.5.0 has not been released yet.
